questions.question: Does your organization maintain an up-to-date inventory of all enterprise assets (hardware)?
Is an inventory of all software authorized and actively managed?
Are vulnerabilities regularly identified and managed through scans and patching?
Are administrative privileges restricted and monitored?
Is secure configuration management enforced across hardware and software assets?
Are audit logs collected, protected, and regularly reviewed?
Are email and web browser protections (e.g., filtering) in place?
Is malware protection (AV/EDR) deployed and monitored on all endpoints?
Is DNS filtering or protective DNS implemented?
Are data recovery procedures tested regularly?
Is secure configuration applied to network infrastructure devices?
Are boundary defenses like firewalls and proxies configured and monitored?
Are security awareness and training activities regularly delivered to all employees?
Are incident response plans documented and tested?
Are penetration tests or red-team exercises conducted to evaluate defenses?
Are application software security practices integrated into development pipelines?
Are wireless access points secured using strong authentication and encryption?
Are service provider risks assessed and managed continuously?
Is multifactor authentication implemented for remote and privileged access?
Are enterprise data classification and handling rules clearly defined and enforced?
